vsParam:
... Hehe, well done.
[px]! It's a pass...

Brilliant! Now you can go out of the school!
And you can collect recipes for the "Pyroxene of Wisdom"!

Great! [px], you're impressive!
You've taken a huge step toward your goal!
I knew [px] would have passed the exam!

Your efforts didn't fail you! [px], you've been
working so hard! Haha, congrats!

What... What brings all of you here?!
How did you know this exam?!

Heehee, it's me. I told everyone.
Because [px] always tries to hide everything from us.

Come on, we're friends, [px]?! If you want to
go outside of school... we should join you!

Hehe... Actually, we've gotten approvals for
the short-term study abroad programs too!

You know, I am a guard!
I'm supposed to be everywhere to protect my students.

... Ah.
Ahem ahem. We'll leave you alone for now.
Huh? You'll leave me alone for now!?

[px]!
Anyhow, we're going to travel around together!
Everyone, do you really want to join me?

Of course! It's going to be a wonderful journey
as long as we're with you, [px]!

I think so too.
I happen to need to go out to do various investigations, hehe.

You'll run into a lot of danger outside there.
Let me protect you.

Huh? Ah, wait!?
Something is wrong! Really wrong!?

I'm not happy! I want to be a student here too!
And I can join you to travel around, [px]!

Oh... But you won't be a student here until you pass
the transfer exam. You have a lot to learn, Wistyria.

Um... Even... Even so, I'd like to give it a try! I will be
your kouhai and join you to travel around someday!

You're going to be our kouhai here!
Hehe, sounds great! Interesting!

Yeah! Deal, Wistyria!
... We're waiting for you!

Hehe... So, [px].
You're free to go anywhere you want to from now on.
... As a farewell gift, please take this.

This is the skill book of "Alchemy of Wind"——one of the four
necessary elements of skills to make the "Pyroxene of Wisdom".

I happened to get it while traveling around long long ago...
Just take it.

Wow... It's so great, [px]!
Thank you, Bergamot Sensei!

Hehe...
I'm happy to give it to my adorable student.

As for other skills of alchemy... Namely, Earth, Fire and
Water, the skill books are still hidden in corners of this world.
You can gather emerald boards while searching for them.

Good luck to you, dear [px].
... You're welcome to come back to the Academy anytime.
Alright, where shall we go first?

Let me see...
Maybe we could go to the Ribrum region which is the nearest?

Oh, it's famous for its highly developed culture and art?
Sounds interesting. Maybe it's a good choice.

Anyway, we can think about it after we get there?
Let's set off now...

Hazel!? Wistyria!?
What brings all of you here!?

Hey hey, you haven't said goodbye but we're not
just strangers! We're "comrades" in the Academy!

Yeah, right!
You're going nowhere without saying goodbye!

I agree!
At least, let me see you off!

OK! Let's do this together!
Let's use the Academy farewell slogan, ready!

Haha!
So many people gather here for us.

It's once in a blue moon...
Thank you all... Hehe.

OK! So, [px]!
Let's respond to them decidedly!

May my students be blessed on the way ahead.
Keep going, [px]...
